analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0x9aeef061332cabc96ba03e5de5c7a084132fc7da.sol:
	Contract ROC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0x9aeef061332cabc96ba03e5de5c7a084132fc7da.sol#290)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x9aeef061332cabc96ba03e5de5c7a084132fc7da.sol:

Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/22/0x9aeef061332cabc96ba03e5de5c7a084132fc7da.sol#66-68) is not in mixedCase
